thread.title: Danny Dyer’s daughter 'branded fan who her dad allegedly sexted a "vile ugly whore"'
thread.title_full: Danny Dyer’s daughter 'branded fan who her dad allegedly sexted a "vile ugly whore"'

author: Mark Jefferies
title: Danny Dyer’s daughter 'branded fan who her dad allegedly sexted a "vile ugly whore"'
text:
Showbiz Danny Dyer’s daughter 'branded fan who her dad allegedly sexted a "vile ugly whore"' Dani, 20, wrote threatening messages on Facebook after the EastEnders actor, 39, reportedly sent the woman a snap of his manhood Share Danny Dyer and daughter Dani, who attacked the fan on social media (Photo: FameFlynet)   
Danny Dyer’s daughter reportedly branded the fan who her dad allegedly sexted a “vile ugly whore”. 
Dani, 20, wrote threatening messages on Facebook after the EastEnders actor , 39, reportedly sent the woman a snap of his manhood. 
Dani said: “If I see you I’ll f g hurt ya. Karma is a bitch you vile ugly disgusting human being.” 
Dyer’s wife, Jo Mas, is expected to stand by him amid the sexting claims . Danny with wife Jo Mas, who is standing by her man, and daughter Dani (Photo: FameFlynet) 
The fan, a mum in her early 30s, says Dyer, who plays Queen Vic landlord Mick Carter, sent a photo of his privates in June, nine weeks before he wed Jo. 
But a source close to Danny and Jo, 40, said: “It was a bit of fun that got out of hand. 
“Jo won’t split up with the love of her life over a few messages. Everything we’ve heard suggests she’ll stand by her man.” Dani defended her dad after sexting allegations 
Dyer is believed to be in South Africa on a break from filming the BBC1 soap after he began boozing again in January. A source said: “He’s there to sort his life out.” 
He is expected back on the EastEnders set next month. Danny is taking a break from filming EastEnders (Photo: BBC) 
Jo is said to have kicked him out after he went on a bender with Lily Allen in 2008, and when he was linked to Billie Piper in 2001. 
But she forgave him in 2014 when he allegedly spent the night with a student. 
Both Jo and a spokesman for EastEnders declined to comment. Like us on Facebook
